transcript: No, we won't. It's pointless. It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus. I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent Standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped Expectingly waiting for the fish to show up and the fish won't show up

segments.text: No, we won't. It's pointless. It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus. I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent
Standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped
Expectingly waiting for the fish to show up and the fish won't show up

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: No, we won't.  It's pointless.  It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus.  I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.  And the fish won't show up.
